DOC.brief_summary: Research last year report increased popularity complementary therapy ( CTs ) integration CTs mainstream medical setting , health care organization insurance plan . These trend may present new challenge new opportunity health care provision . In Sweden elsewhere , major challenge include great variety quality CT provision within health care lack national international recommendation integration CTs conventional care model , i.e . lack conceptual model deliver integrative medicine ( IM ) . This may partly result scarce evidence base support IM provision within public health care service , e.g . lack IM compare usual care randomise clinical trial . It remain largely unknown whether comprehensive model IM clinically cost effectively different conventional care provision . Back neck pain costly , conventionally manage primary care two common condition treat CTs . We develop comprehensive collaborative consensus model IM adapt Swedish primary care . The aim pilot study explore develop IM model help patient back/neck pain good usual primary care management , i.e . test hypothesis IM would effective treatment usual .
DOC.brief_title: Exploring Integrative Medicine Swedish Primary Care
DOC.criteria: Back/neck pain without headache least two week least three time per week Resident Stockholm County Literate Swedish Willing able comply study requirement Specific pathology severe cause back/neck pain malignant disease , vertebral fracture severe progressive neurological symptom .
